doc.english: We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic, he added.
doc.italian: Abbiamo topi di quattro mesi che prima erano diabetici e ora non lo sono più, ha aggiunto.

target: We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic, he added.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Abbiamo topi di quattro mesi che prima erano diabetici e ora non lo sono più, ha aggiunto.>

resps: <We have four-month-old mice that were previously diabetic and are no longer so, he added.>
filtered_resps: <We have four-month-old mice that were previously diabetic and are no longer so, he added.>

doc.english: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

target: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

doc.english: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

target: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

doc.english: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
doc.italian: La segretaria permanente del Comitato per il Nobel per la letteratura dell'Accademia svedese, Sara Danius, nel corso di un programma radiofonico andato in onda lunedì sulla radio svedese Sveriges Radio, ha annunciato pubblicamente che il Comitato ha rinunciato a contattare Bob Dylan, non riuscendo a raggiungerlo direttamente per comunicargli la vittoria del Nobel per la letteratura 2016.

target: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

target: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

doc.english: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
doc.italian: Se da un lato sembra che ci sia un vaccino sperimentale in grado di ridurre la mortalità da Ebola, dall'altro non è stato trovato ancora nessun farmaco che si sia chiaramente dimostrato adatto al trattamento dell'infezione esistente.

target: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Se da un lato sembra che ci sia un vaccino sperimentale in grado di ridurre la mortalità da Ebola, dall'altro non è stato trovato ancora nessun farmaco che si sia chiaramente dimostrato adatto al trattamento dell'infezione esistente.>

resps: <On the one hand, it seems that there is an experimental vaccine that can reduce Ebola mortality, but on the other hand, no medication has been found that has been clearly proven to be suitable for treating existing infections.>
filtered_resps: <On the one hand, it seems that there is an experimental vaccine that can reduce Ebola mortality, but on the other hand, no medication has been found that has been clearly proven to be suitable for treating existing infections.>

doc.english: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
doc.italian: Un cocktail di anticorpi, ZMapp, si è inizialmente mostrato promettente sul campo, ma studi formali hanno rivelato un'efficacia inferiore rispetto a quella sperata nella prevenzione dei decessi.

target: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

doc.english: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
doc.italian: Nello studio PALM, ZMapp è stato usato come mezzo di controllo, ovvero gli scienziati lo hanno impiegato come riferimento e messo a confronto con le altre tre terapie.

target: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

doc.english: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
doc.italian: La USA Gymnastics appoggia la lettera del Comitato Olimpico degli Stati Uniti e riconosce l'assoluta necessità da parte della comunità olimpica di adoperarsi per creare un ambiente sicuro per tutti i suoi atleti.

target: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

Translate the following sentence into English: <La USA Gymnastics appoggia la lettera del Comitato Olimpico degli Stati Uniti e riconosce l'assoluta necessità da parte della comunità olimpica di adoperarsi per creare un ambiente sicuro per tutti i suoi atleti.>

resps: <The USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity for the Olympic community to take action to create a safe environment for all its athletes.>

doc.english: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
doc.italian: Concordiamo con quanto affermato dall'USOC, ovvero che gli interessi dei nostri atleti e dei nostri club, e del loro sport, possono essere meglio serviti portando avanti un cambiamento significativo all'interno della nostra organizzazione, e non con la decertificazione.

target: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

resps: <We agree with what the USOC has said, namely that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and of their sport, can be better served by bringing about a significant change within our organization, rather than through decertification.>

doc.english: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
doc.italian: La USA Gymnastics ha promosso un'indagine indipendente per capire come sia stato possibile che un abuso delle dimensioni descritte con tanto coraggio da chi è riuscito a sopravvivere a Larry Nassar sia rimasto nascosto per così tanto tempo, ed è disposta ad implementare qualunque cambiamento necessario o adeguato.

target: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

Translate the following sentence into English: <La USA Gymnastics ha promosso un'indagine indipendente per capire come sia stato possibile che un abuso delle dimensioni descritte con tanto coraggio da chi è riuscito a sopravvivere a Larry Nassar sia rimasto nascosto per così tanto tempo, ed è disposta ad implementare qualunque cambiamento necessario o adeguato.>

resps: <The USA Gymnastics has launched an independent investigation to understand how a abuse of the described magnitude, with the courage of those who survived Larry Nassar, was able to remain hidden for so long, and is willing to implement any necessary or appropriate changes.>
filtered_resps: <The USA Gymnastics has launched an independent investigation to understand how a abuse of the described magnitude, with the courage of those who survived Larry Nassar, was able to remain hidden for so long, and is willing to implement any necessary or appropriate changes.>

doc.english: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
doc.italian: USA Gymnastics e USOC hanno il medesimo obiettivo: rendere la ginnastica e gli altri sport il più sicuri possibile, affinché gli atleti possano inseguire i loro sogni in un ambiente affidabile, positivo e responsabilizzato.

target: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

doc.english: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
doc.italian: Nel corso delle elezioni del 1976, consigliò Carter in materia di politica estera per poi ricoprire il ruolo di Consigliere per la sicurezza nazionale (NSA) dal 1977 al 1981, subentrando a Henry Kissinger.

target: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

resps: <During the 1976 elections, he advised Carter on foreign policy and later served as National Security Adviser (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.>

doc.english: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
doc.italian: In qualità di membro dell'NSA, ha collaborato con Carter alla gestione diplomatica degli affari internazionali, tra cui gli Accordi di Camp David del 1978, la normalizzazione dei rapporti tra Cina e Stati Uniti alla fine degli anni '70, la rivoluzione iraniana (che ha portato alla crisi degli ostaggi in Iran nel 1979) e l'invasione sovietica dell'Afghanistan nel 1979.

target: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

doc.english: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

target: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

doc.english: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
doc.italian: Siccome il piumaggio del dinosauro non è dotato della struttura di base, il cosiddetto rachide, ma ha invece altre caratteristiche tipiche delle piume, barbe e barbule, i ricercatori hanno concluso che il rachide sia probabilmente il risultato di uno sviluppo evolutivo successivo a tali caratteristiche.

target: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Siccome il piumaggio del dinosauro non è dotato della struttura di base, il cosiddetto rachide, ma ha invece altre caratteristiche tipiche delle piume, barbe e barbule, i ricercatori hanno concluso che il rachide sia probabilmente il risultato di uno sviluppo evolutivo successivo a tali caratteristiche.>

resps: <Since the dinosaur's plumage lacks the basic structure, the so-called rachis, but has instead other typical features of feathers, barbs, and barbules, researchers have concluded that the rachis is probably the result of a subsequent evolutionary development.>
filtered_resps: <Since the dinosaur's plumage lacks the basic structure, the so-called rachis, but has instead other typical features of feathers, barbs, and barbules, researchers have concluded that the rachis is probably the result of a subsequent evolutionary development.>

doc.english: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
doc.italian: La struttura del piumaggio fa pensare che non fosse utilizzato per il volo, ma piuttosto per la regolazione della temperatura o per il corteggiamento. I ricercatori ipotizzano che, pur trattandosi della coda di un giovane dinosauro, il reperto mostri un piumaggio da adulto e non il piumino da pulcino.

target: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Fu derubato dai pirati, attaccato da un cane rabbioso in Tibet, sfuggì al matrimonio in Nepal e fu arrestato in India.>

resps: <He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and arrested in India.>
filtered_resps: <He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and arrested in India.>

doc.english: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
doc.italian: Lo standard 802.11n può operare sia nella banda dei 2.4Ghz che in quella dei 5.0Ghz.

target: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

doc.english: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
doc.italian: Posto che la stazione base abbia doppie radio, questo gli consentirà di essere retrocompatibile con 802.11a, 802.11b e 802.11g.

target: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

doc.english: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
doc.italian: Le velocità 802.11n sono considerevolmente più elevate rispetto a quelle delle versioni precedenti, con un throughput massimo teorico di 600 Mbps.

target: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

doc.english: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

target: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

doc.english: We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level, Hu said.
doc.italian: Ci sforzeremo di tagliare le emissioni di diossido di carbonio per unità di PIL di un margine notevole entro il 2020, rispetto ai livelli del 2005, ha affermato Hu.

target: We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level, Hu said.

doc.english: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
doc.italian: Non ha stabilito un valore preciso della riduzione, affermando che essa dipenderà dalla produttività economica cinese.

target: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

doc.english: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
doc.italian: Hu ha invitato i Paesi in via di sviluppo a "evitare la vecchia strada di inquinare prima e ripulire poi".

target: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

doc.english: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
doc.italian: Ammonisce: "Nessuno può garantire che qualsiasi azione in Iraq in questo momento fermerà le guerre settarie, la crescente violenza o una deriva verso il caos".

target: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Ammonisce: "Nessuno può garantire che qualsiasi azione in Iraq in questo momento fermerà le guerre settarie, la crescente violenza o una deriva verso il caos".>

resps: <He warns: "No one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this moment will stop sectarian wars, growing violence, or a slide towards chaos".>
filtered_resps: <He warns: "No one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this moment will stop sectarian wars, growing violence, or a slide towards chaos".>

doc.english: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
doc.italian: Il rapporto inizia con un appello a un dibattito aperto e alla creazione di un consenso negli Stati Uniti circa la politica nei confronti del Medio Oriente.

target: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

doc.english: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
doc.italian: Il rapporto è fortemente critico in merito a quasi tutti gli aspetti dell'attuale politica dell'Esecutivo nei confronti dell'Iraq ed esorta a un cambiamento immediato di direzione.

target: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

doc.english: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
doc.italian: La prima delle sue 78 raccomandazioni riguarda l'avvio di una nuova iniziativa diplomatica da intraprendere entro la fine di quest'anno con lo scopo di proteggere i confini dell'Iraq da azioni ostili e di riprendere i rapporti diplomatici con i suoi vicini.

target: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

doc.english: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
doc.italian: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, attuale senatrice e first lady argentina, ieri sera ha annunciato la sua candidatura presidenziale a La Plata, città che sorge a 50 chilometri (31 miglia) da Buenos Aires.

target: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

doc.english: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
doc.italian: La Kirchner ha scelto il Teatro Argentino per annunciare la sua intenzione di candidarsi per la presidenza, lo stesso luogo da cui nel 2005 aveva dato il via alla sua campagna elettorale per il Senato come membro della delegazione della provincia di Buenos Aires.

target: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

doc.english: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
doc.italian: La discussione è stata scatenata da polemiche sulla spesa per gli aiuti e la ricostruzione in seguito all'uragano Katrina, che alcuni conservatori fiscali, scherzando, hanno etichettato come "il New Deal di Bush per New Orleans".

target: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

doc.english: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
doc.italian: La critica liberale nei confronti dell'impegno di ricostruzione si è focalizzata sull'assegnazione di contratti per la ricostruzione a insider di Washington riconosciuti.

target: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <In vari punti di Roma sono stati installati grandi schermi televisivi per permettere alla gente di assistere alla cerimonia.>

doc.english: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
doc.italian: Dopo l'incontro di martedì durato 25 minuti con il leader dell'NDP Jack Layton nel PMO, il primo ministro Stephen Harper si è detto d'accordo a sottoporre il 'Clean Air Act' del governo al riesame di un comitato composto da tutte le parti in preparazione della seconda lettura.

target: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

doc.english: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
doc.italian: Dacché il governo federale è intervenuto rilevando il finanziamento dell'ospedale Mersey di Devonport, in Tasmania, il governo statale e diversi deputati hanno criticato la misura come uno stratagemma preelettorale in vista delle consultazioni federali in calendario a novembre.

target: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

doc.english: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

target: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo il National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry a questo punto non costituisce una minaccia per la terraferma.>

resps: <According to the National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry is no longer a threat to land.>
filtered_resps: <According to the National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry is no longer a threat to land.>

doc.english: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
doc.italian: Secondo una stima dell'USACE, 6 pollici di pioggia potrebbero rompere gli argini danneggiati in precedenza.

target: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

doc.english: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
doc.italian: Il Ninth Ward, dove l'uragano Katrina aveva provocato inondazioni alte fino a 20 piedi, in questo momento è quasi completamente sommerso poiché l'acqua ha superato l'argine vicino.

target: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

doc.english: He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion.
doc.italian: In sostanza [Wales] ci ha mentito sin dall'inizio. Innanzitutto, comportandosi come se fosse per motivi legali. In secondo luogo, fingendo di darci ascolto fino al momento della effettiva cancellazione delle opere da parte sua.

target: He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion.

doc.english: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

target: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

doc.english: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
doc.italian: L'attività svolta è stata per lo più teorica, ma il programma è stato scritto per simulare i rilievi effettuati della galassia del Sagittario.

target: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

doc.english: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
doc.italian: L'effetto cercato dal team doveva essere provocato dalle forze mareali tra la materia oscura di questa galassia e la materia oscura della Via Lattea.

target: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

doc.english: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

doc.english: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
doc.italian: Questa teoria sostiene che gran parte della materia oscura intorno a una galassia è raccolta in una specie di alone, formato da una moltitudine di piccole particelle.

target: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Questa teoria sostiene che gran parte della materia oscura intorno a una galassia è raccolta in una specie di alone, formato da una moltitudine di piccole particelle.>

resps: <This theory suggests that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is collected in a kind of halo, formed by a multitude of small particles.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <La collisione tra i satelliti, entrambi aventi un peso superiore alle 1.000 libbre e una velocità di circa 17.500 miglia all'ora, è avvenuta a 491 miglia dalla Terra.>

resps: <The collision between the satellites, both weighing over 1,000 pounds and traveling at a speed of about 17,500 miles per hour, occurred 491 miles from Earth.>
filtered_resps: <The collision between the satellites, both weighing over 1,000 pounds and traveling at a speed of about 17,500 miles per hour, occurred 491 miles from Earth.>

doc.english: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
doc.italian: Gli scienziati sostengono che la collisione ha provocato un'esplosione imponente.

target: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.

doc.english: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
doc.italian: Stanno ancora cercando di determinare la dimensione dello schianto e che conseguenze avrà sulla Terra.

target: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.

doc.english: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
doc.italian: Le autorità dell'Ohio riferiscono che un medico che lavorava all'ospedale pediatrico di Pittsburgh, in Pennsylvania, sarà accusato di omicidio aggravato in seguito al ritrovamento del corpo senza vita di sua madre nel bagagliaio dell'auto della donna avvenuto mercoledì.

target: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.

doc.english: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
doc.italian: La dottoressa Malar Balasubramanian, 29, è stata ritrovata in Ohio, a Blue Ash, un sobborgo a circa 15 miglia a nord di Cincinnati, riversa a terra accanto alla strada con addosso una maglietta e l'intimo, apparentemente sotto l'effetto di farmaci.

target: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.

doc.english: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
doc.italian: I maiali sono portatori della malattia, che successivamente viene trasmessa all'uomo tramite le punture di zanzare.

target: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <I maiali sono portatori della malattia, che successivamente viene trasmessa all'uomo tramite le punture di zanzare.>

resps: <Pigs are carriers of the disease, which is then transmitted to humans through mosquito bites.>
filtered_resps: <Pigs are carriers of the disease, which is then transmitted to humans through mosquito bites.>

doc.english: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
doc.italian: Il governo indiano, spinto dall'epidemia, ha adottato alcune misure come il dispiegamento di persone per la cattura dei maiali nelle zone più colpite, la distribuzione di migliaia di zanzariere e l'irrorazione con pesticidi.

target: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il governo indiano, spinto dall'epidemia, ha adottato alcune misure come il dispiegamento di persone per la cattura dei maiali nelle zone più colpite, la distribuzione di migliaia di zanzariere e l'irrorazione con pesticidi.>

resps: <The Indian government, driven by the epidemic, has taken measures such as deploying people to catch pigs in affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets, and spraying pesticides.>
filtered_resps: <The Indian government, driven by the epidemic, has taken measures such as deploying people to catch pigs in affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets, and spraying pesticides.>

doc.english: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
doc.italian: Il governo ha anche promesso diversi milioni di fiale di vaccino contro l'encefalite, per fare in modo che il prossimo anno le strutture sanitarie non si trovino impreparate.

target: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.

doc.english: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
doc.italian: I piani di consegna dei vaccini nelle zone storicamente più colpite quest'anno sono stati ritardati per la mancanza di fondi e perché è stato assegnato loro un basso livello di priorità rispetto ad altre malattie.

target: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

doc.english: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
doc.italian: Tre anni dopo il suo trasferimento in Svezia avvenuto nel 1956, Słania iniziò a lavorare per le Poste svedesi, diventandone l'incisore capo.

target: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.

doc.italian: Ha creato più di 1.000 francobolli, sia per la Svezia che per ulteriori 28 Paesi.

doc.english: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
doc.italian: La qualità e il dettaglio del suo lavoro sono talmente riconosciuti che è il suo è diventato uno dei pochissimi "nomi familiari" tra i filatelisti. Alcuni si sono specializzati addirittura nel collezionare unicamente il suo lavoro.

target: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.

Translate the following sentence into English: <La qualità e il dettaglio del suo lavoro sono talmente riconosciuti che è il suo è diventato uno dei pochissimi "nomi familiari" tra i filatelisti. Alcuni si sono specializzati addirittura nel collezionare unicamente il suo lavoro.>

resps: <The quality and detail of his work are so recognized that it has become one of the few "household names" among philatelists. Some have even specialized in collecting only his work.>
filtered_resps: <The quality and detail of his work are so recognized that it has become one of the few "household names" among philatelists. Some have even specialized in collecting only his work.>

doc.english: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
doc.italian: Nel 2000 ha ottenuto il suo millesimo francobollo, il magnifico "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" ("Grandi gesta dei re svedesi") di David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, che è annoverato nel Guinness dei primati.

target: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il camionista, che ha 64 anni, è uscito illeso dallo scontro.>

resps: <The 64-year-old truck driver emerged unscathed from the collision.>
filtered_resps: <The 64-year-old truck driver emerged unscathed from the collision.>

doc.english: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
doc.italian: Il veicolo coinvolto è stato rimosso dalla scena dell'incidente il giorno stesso, attorno alle 12:00 GMT.

target: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.

target: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.

doc.english: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. <Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Tra le 22:00 e le 23:00 MDT i detenuti hanno appiccato un incendio nel cortile.>

doc.english: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
doc.italian: I risultati finali delle elezioni presidenziali e parlamentari in Namibia hanno visto la rielezione del presidente in carica, Hifikepunye Pohamba, che ha ottenuto un vantaggio significativo.

target: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <I risultati finali delle elezioni presidenziali e parlamentari in Namibia hanno visto la rielezione del presidente in carica, Hifikepunye Pohamba, che ha ottenuto un vantaggio significativo.>

resps: <The final results of the presidential and parliamentary elections in Namibia have seen the re-election of the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, who has gained a significant advantage.>
filtered_resps: <The final results of the presidential and parliamentary elections in Namibia have seen the re-election of the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, who has gained a significant advantage.>

<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Le ha distinte la difesa disciplinata, l'abilità di maneggiare la palla e l'eccellente lavoro di squadra. Era chiaro che erano loro la squadra da battere.>

resps: <He praised their disciplined defense, ball-handling skills, and excellent teamwork. It was clear that they were the team to beat.>
filtered_resps: <He praised their disciplined defense, ball-handling skills, and excellent teamwork. It was clear that they were the team to beat.>

doc.english: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
doc.italian: L'albero, a detta dei funzionari della città di Amsterdam e del museo di Anna Frank, è infestato da un fungo e costituisce un pericolo per la salute pubblica perché, sostengono, correva l'imminente rischio di cadere.

target: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.

doc.english: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.

resps: <Thermal infrared images show temperature oscillations between day and night, indicating that it is likely a cave.>
filtered_resps: <Thermal infrared images show temperature oscillations between day and night, indicating that it is likely a cave.>

doc.english:
They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.	Di giorno sono più fredde della superficie circostante e di notte più calde.
Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground, said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
doc.italian: Glen Cushing del team di astrogeologi dell'agenzia geologica statunitense (USGS) e della Northern Arizona University di Flagstaff, in Arizona, ha dichiarato: "Il loro comportamento termico non è costante come quello delle grandi grotte terrestri, che spesso mantengono una temperatura relativamente stabile, ma è coerente con il fatto che si tratta di profondi buchi nel terreno".

target:

doc.english: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
doc.italian: In Francia, il voto è tradizionalmente un’esperienza poco tecnologica: gli elettori entrano in una cabina isolata e mettono in una busta un foglio prestampato che indica il candidato prescelto.

target: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.

resps: <In France, voting is traditionally a non-technological experience: voters enter a isolated booth and put a pre-printed ballot paper in a box indicating the chosen candidate.>

doc.english: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
doc.italian: Dopo la verifica della sua identità da parte dei funzionari, l'elettore deposita la busta nell'urna e firma il registro elettorale.

target: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.

doc.english: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
doc.italian: Dal 1988 le urne elettorali devono essere trasparenti, di modo che elettori e osservatori possano testimoniare che all'inizio della votazione non sono presenti buste e che non ne vengano inserite altre oltre a quelle degli elettori, debitamente conteggiati e autorizzati.

target: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.

doc.english: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
doc.italian: I candidati possono inviare dei loro rappresentanti per assistere a ogni fase del processo. Di sera, i volontari effettuano il computo dei voti sotto rigido controllo, conformemente alle procedure specifiche.

target: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <I candidati possono inviare dei loro rappresentanti per assistere a ogni fase del processo. Di sera, i volontari effettuano il computo dei voti sotto rigido controllo, conformemente alle procedure specifiche.>

resps: <Candidates can send representatives to attend every phase of the process. In the evening, volunteers count the votes under strict control, in accordance with specific procedures.>

gen_args_0.arg_0:
Translate the following sentence into English: <Nella giornata di lunedì, alcuni scienziati della Scuola di Medicina dell'Università di Stanford hanno annunciato l'invenzione di un nuovo strumento diagnostico capace di ordinare le cellule in base al tipo: un chip minuscolo che può essere stampato utilizzando stampanti a getto di inchiostro al costo di circa 1 centesimo di dollaro l'uno.>
<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

doc.english: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
doc.italian: Perry ha dichiarato: "Tornerò in Texas per verificare i risultati della consultazione di stasera e vedere se per me c'è la possibilità di proseguire in questa competizione"; tuttavia in seguito ha affermato che rimarrà in corsa e il 21 gennaio parteciperà alle primarie nel South Carolina.

target: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.

doc.english: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
doc.italian: Da quanto appreso dal sito web di notizie di intrattenimento TMZ, il fotografo ha fermato il suo veicolo dalla parte opposta di Sepulveda Boulevard e ha cercato di fotografare l'ufficiale di polizia che dirigeva il traffico allo stop, poi ha attraversato la strada e ha proseguito, costringendo l'ufficiale di polizia della California Highway Patrol che stava effettuando il controllo del traffico allo stop a intimargli per due volte di tornare indietro.

target: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.

doc.english: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.

doc.english: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
doc.italian: Secondo la causa, l'inadeguata sanificazione dei rifiuti del campo delle Nazioni Unite ha provocato la contaminazione batterica dell'affluente del fiume Artibonite, uno dei principali di Haiti.

target: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.

<On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Secondo i responsabili della ricerca questo strumento potrebbe consentire diagnosi precoci di cancro, tubercolosi, HIV e malaria per i malati che vivono in Paesi a basso reddito. In alcuni di questi Paesi il tasso di sopravvivenza legati a patologie come il cancro al seno può essere addirittura la metà rispetto a quello registrato nei Paesi più abbienti.>
<Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali.>
<The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee.>
<The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.>

Translate the following sentence into English: <I primi rapporti affermano che il velivolo è stato deviato nuovamente verso l'Afghanistan dopo che è stato negato l'atterraggio di emergenza a Ürümqi.>

resps: <Initial reports say the aircraft was diverted back to Afghanistan after an emergency landing was denied at Ürümqi.>
filtered_resps: <Initial reports say the aircraft was diverted back to Afghanistan after an emergency landing was denied at Ürümqi.>

doc.english: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
doc.italian: Gli incidenti aerei sono comuni in Iran, la cui flotta è ormai obsoleta e mal mantenuta, sia dal punto di vista civile che da quello militare.

target: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.

doc.english: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
doc.italian: Le sanzioni internazionali hanno significato non poter acquistare nuovi velivoli.

target: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.

doc.english: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.

target: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
